about_the_game: As you may have realized, the Everlasting Abundance soundtrack is heavily influenced by Final Fantasy (I to X) and Chrono Trigger music. I wanted the soundtrack to evoke the FF & CT sounds but at the same time, to (kinda) have its own personality, using original melodies and motifs. Many of the tracks are a (poor) tribute to some of my most beloved themes from those games. Nobuo Uematsu and Yasunori Mitsuda are my favorite game composers and I wanted to (try to) pay homage to their absolutely beautiful works. This was my first experience as a composer though, so the quality and complexity of my own music are (extremely) far from their level. Despite this, I tried my best and had a ton of fun making it. Hope you enjoy!
